name: Astro Light
description:
How does my game fit the theme?:

- Opposites Attract, so i took that concept and said Platformer and a Shoot em Up are completely different genres, yet go together so well. this is what I interpret the theme

Play as Allana who must escape the Emperor's Army. 

Creator's Note:

I hope you enjoy my game, there are tons of modes to try, as to why i didn't put 1 platform in survival mode, welp I would of had to redo my random spawn to fit 1 platform, and i got lazy and tired of working at this game at that point.

how to play is in the main menu, hope you enjoyed the game
